Description: Textile fragment; torn strip of linen cloth, medium to fine quality. Undyed, bleached (through washing?); colour now cream/greyish-cream. Edges torn. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.28 ends per 10mm and weft c.16 picks per 10mm.
